data.expected_result: The client zooms into the area you're pinching on, like it used to before Electron 3.x
data.short_description: Pinch-to-zoom on touchscreen devices doesn't work anymore
data.steps_to_repro: - Use two fingers in a pinching motion on your Discord client, on your touchscreen  - Additional information (I didn't know where else this is supposed to go): this is not a bug with Electron. Electron v3.x set the default visual zoom levels to 100%~100%, it IS possible to set them back programmatically
